body_html:
Unfortunately it's not quite possible for me to reinstall 0.3.1 at the moment to compare and provide a code example

But if you have 0.4 installed, could you show a (minimal) code example that shows how it is not training? That would be tremendously helpful.
(And yes, the SELU implementation has changed - eg the scale multiplication has been fused into elu.)

body:
> Unfortunately it's not quite possible for me to reinstall 0.3.1 at the moment to compare and provide a code example

But if you have 0.4 installed, could you show a (minimal) code example that shows how it is not training? That would be tremendously helpful.
(And yes, the SELU implementation has changed - eg the scale multiplication has been fused into elu.)
